summary: NSYNC was an American boy band formed in 1995 in Orlando, Florida. The group, consisting of Chris Kirkpatrick, Justin Timberlake, Joey Fatone, Lance Bass, and JC Chasez, gained popularity in Europe before breaking into the U.S. market with their hit single "I Want You Back." Their second album, "No Strings Attached," sold over a million copies in one day. NSYNC had many top 10 hits, including "Bye Bye Bye" and "It's Gonna Be Me." They performed at big events like the Super Bowl and the Olympics, and collaborated with famous artists like Elton John and Michael Jackson. The band went on hiatus in 2002 but reunited in 2023.
title: NSYNC
